1) Odoo Default Tax Behaviour - The Taxes will be set based on Odoo's default functional behaviour i.e. based on Odoo's Tax and Fiscal Position configurations.
2) Create New Tax If Not Found - System will search the tax data received from Magento in Odoo, will create a new one if it fails in finding it.
How total tax amount is computed in Magento orders.

Note :
Magento2 supports Tax Calculation Method Based On – Total, Row Total, or Unit price.
Unit price – this means that Magento will calculate tax on each quantity of each product in the cart, then round those-up and add them together.
In Odoo, rounding is only supported per line and rounding globally, it doesn't support rounding based on unit price.
Here, set the tax calculation method based on the Magento2 Tax calculation method (Magent2 admin panel > Stores > Settings >Configuration > Sales > Tax > Calculation Settings > Tax Calculation Method Based on)
